title: The Charge of the Zeit Brigade 8/14: The Fresh Prince of Bel Air, Robert Trump, NBA, Michael Cohen, Ryan Reynolds
itunes:title: The Charge of the Zeit Brigade 8/14: The Fresh Prince of Bel Air, Robert Trump, NBA, Michael Cohen, Ryan Reynolds
description:
On this edition of Charge of the Zeit Brigade Jack and Miles discuss The Fresh Prince of Bel Air being remade as a drama, the President's brother is sick, the NBA playoffs are upon us, the early-released Forward to Michael Cohen's new book suggests some spicy content, and Ryan Reynolds started his own streaming service where he's streaming JUST his 2003 film 'Full Proof'.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
